title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo—CLI and Go library for pulling and running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: First-party JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama HTTP API—works in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API with sync & async clients.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLM or chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web interface for any Ollama model—runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and embedding via local Ollama server.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with readline, history and syntax highlighting for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-chem
summary: Chemistry-aware fine-tunes (ChemLLM) packaged for Ollama with reaction prediction prompts.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that builds Ollama and common models deterministically for NixOS.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama generators and embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama-index for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel-based chats.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir OTP library with GenServer and LiveView hooks for chatting with Ollama.

title: ollama-cpp
summary: Header-only C++17 client for Ollama HTTP API with CMake FetchContent support.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library and CLI for Ollama with cross-compilation to aarch64/x86_64.
